name: Crazy Monster Shooter
description:
Survive the waves of hellish enemies who want to kill and collect their loot.

Upgrade your hero and unlock new ones to fight and save you from hell.

Follow me on Itch to receive future updates and 

check my Website for other games!

Also avaible on Google Play

How to play:

  • - Move with WASD
  • - Aim with mouse
  • - Shoot with Left Mouse Button
  • - Throw grenade with Right Mouse Button

Features:

  • - simple input
  • - Infinite mode to set your own record
  • - Online Cross-platform Leaderboard (Mobile & WebGL)

Credits:
